item.title: Hamburger dressing
item.description: A delicious home made hamburger dressing ğŸ” â²ï¸ Prep time: 1 min ğŸ³ Cook time: 1 min Ingredients 3 tbsp mayonnese or aioli 2 tbsp ketchup 1 tbsp sriracha 1 clove garlic, if using mayonnese and not aioli (optional) Directions Mix ingredients in a bowl
